title: Dortmund's Time to Shine?
description:
The FC crew preview tomorrow's clash between Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich and question if Dortmund's unpredictability could be an asset heading into the match. Plus, the guys react to Carlo Ancelotti dismissing questions about Erling Haaland's release clause and Julie Foudy joins the show to react to England defeating the United States.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Dortmund vs Bayern preview; Carlo Ancelotti dismisses Erling Haaland rumors; England defeats United States 2-1
